concurrent_bitbucket_import_jobs_limit.description: Maximum number of simultaneous import jobs for Bitbucket Cloud importer

concurrent_bitbucket_server_import_jobs_.description: Maximum number of simultaneous import jobs for Bitbucket Server importer

concurrent_github_import_jobs_limit.description: Maximum number of simultaneous import jobs for GitHub importer

group_api_limit.description: Number of requests allowed to the GET /api/v4/groups/:id API.

group_projects_api_limit.description: Number of requests allowed to the GET /api/v4/groups/:id/projects API.

groups_api_limit.description: Number of requests allowed to the GET /api/v4/groups API.

project_api_limit.description: Number of requests allowed to the GET /api/v4/projects/:id API.

projects_api_limit.description: Number of requests allowed to the GET /api/v4/projects API.

user_contributed_projects_api_limit.description: Number of requests allowed to the GET /api/v4/users/:user_id/contributed_projects API.

user_projects_api_limit.description: Number of requests allowed to the GET /api/v4/users/:user_id/projects API.

user_starred_projects_api_limit.description: Number of requests allowed to the GET /api/v4/users/:user_id/starred_projects.

members_delete_limit.description: Number of project or group members a user can delete per minute.

downstream_pipeline_trigger_limit_per_pr.description: Maximum number of downstream pipelines that can be triggered per minute (for a given project, user, and commit).
